function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased preference for gated communities due to safety and security concerns","Impact":"Risk of exacerbating urban density and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promoting alternative urban planning strategies and public health interventions","Technologies":"Advanced urban planning tools, surveillance technology, and public health monitoring systems","People":"Residents of urban areas, public health officials, urban planners","Owner":"Urban planners, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Questioning the assumption that access control effectively prevents the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of false sense of security and inadequate public health measures","Mitigation":"Educating the public on public health best practices and the limitations of access control","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, educational campaigns, and data analytics","People":"Residents of gated communities, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies, local authorities"}]}
